actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The druid makes two attacks, using Vine Staff or Verdant Wisp in any combination.

actions.name: Vine Staff
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Verdant Wisp
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 90 ft. Hit: 10 (3d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The druid casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At Will: Druidcraft, Speak with Animals
2/Day Each: Entangle, Thunderwave
1/Day Each: Animal Messenger, Longstrider, Moonbeam
